thread.title: Extended full I-70 closure in Eagle County because of tanker rollover; mountain travel is treacherous
thread.title_full: Extended full I-70 closure in Eagle County because of tanker rollover; mountain travel is treacherous

author: Jesse Paul
title: Extended full I-70 closure in Eagle County because of tanker rollover; mountain travel is treacherous
text:
Interstate 70 has been closed in both directions in Eagle County on Monday morning after a loaded tanker truck rolled over between Gypsum and Dostero, spilling 2,000 gallons of fuel. 
The Greater Eagle Fire Protection District says the interstate could be closed between the towns for up to eight hours and the Colorado Department of Transportation says it is possible the route won’t reopen until mid-afternoon. 
— Greater Eagle Fire (@gefpd) January 9, 2017 
“It appears the tanker clipped the back of a box truck that was carrying empty beer cans,” said Tracy Trulove, a CDOT spokeswoman. 
There were no reported injuries. Provided by CDOT Interstate 70 has been closed in both directions Jan. 9, 2017 in Eagle County on after a loaded tanker truck rolled over between Gypsum and Dostero, spilling 2,000 gallons of fuel. Provided by CDOT Interstate 70 has been closed in both directions Jan. 9, 2017 in Eagle County on after a loaded tanker truck rolled over between Gypsum and Dostero, spilling 2,000 gallons of fuel. Provided by CDOT Interstate 70 has been closed in both directions Jan. 9, 2017 in Eagle County on after a loaded tanker truck rolled over between Gypsum and Dostero, spilling 2,000 gallons of fuel. Show Caption Expand 
Officials say hazardous materials teams have responded to the wreck. “We have hazmat on scene, we have Colorado State Patrol and CDOT on scene,” Trulove said. 
Traffic is getting by in the area on a frontage road, but officials say it is slow going and there are major delays. Alternate routes — like U.S. 50 or or U.S. 40 — are not recommended because of winter weather making travel elsewhere unsafe. 
“It is slow-moving,” Trulove said. “It’s moving, but it’s moving slowly.” Major I-70 closure b/c crash involving a tanker truck EB closed @ Dotsero,mm 133,WB closed @ Gypsum,mm 140,possible reopen mid-afternoon
